home.title: Harmiana builds tactile, joyful puzzle games.
home.subtitle: We focus on satisfying feel, crystal-clear feedback, and craftsmanship that respects player time.

card1.title: Purposeful Design
card1.body: Bold visuals and clean systems that are easy to learn and hard to master.

card2.title: Feel-First Play
card2.body: Haptics, audio, and animations tuned to make every move satisfying.

card3.title: Global Mindset
card3.body: Built with multilingual support and thoughtful accessibility from day one.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.body1: Harmiana does not collect, store, or share personal data.
privacy.body2: Game data such as best score and settings are stored locally on your device only.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.body1: Harmiana is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.
terms.body2: By using the app you agree that use is at your own risk.

about.title: About Harmiana
about.body1: Harmiana is an independent game studio focused on elegant, satisfying puzzle experiences.
about.body2: We believe in simple rules, deep mastery, and delightful feedback.
